mapper.sql: t.ID, t.CULPRIT_ID, t.REDUCE_TIME, t.END_TIME, t.ACTIONS, t.REASON, t.END_CASE_PATH, t.END_CASE_PATH_NAME, t.EVIDENCE_PATH, t.EVIDENCE_PATH_NAME, t.OPINION, t.COUNTY_VIEWS, t.CITY_OPINION, t.DIC_MONITOR_GRADE_KEY, t.WRIT_NUM, HAND_ON_UNIT, t.COPY_UNIT, t.SHOW_RESULT, t.SHOW_DETAIL, t.SHOW_ACTION, t.PROCURATORATE, t.PROCURATORATE_PATH, t.PROCURATORATE_PATH_NAME, t.RESULT, t.REDUCE_PATH, t.REDUCE_PATH_NAME, t.UN_REDUCE_REASON, t.UN_REDUCE_PATH, t.UN_REDUCE_PATH_NAME, t.DIC_CHECK_TYPE_KEY, t.CONCRETE_FACTS, t.COURT, t.PEOPLE_PROCURATORATE, t.POLICE, t.PRISON, t.ISSUE_TIME, t.CREATED, t.CREATER, t.UPDATED, t.UPDATER, t.DEL_FLAG,t.PROCESS_ID ,t2.name as culprit_name,t3.name as group_name,t.IS_PRINTJYS,t.DIC_SDFSKEY
mapper.delete: delete from SF_REDUCE_PENALTY t where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SF_REDUCE_PENALTY
CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REDUCE_TIME = #{reduceTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ACTIONS = #{actions,jdbcType=CLOB},
REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_CASE_PATH = #{endCasePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_CASE_PATH_NAME = #{endCasePathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVIDENCE_PATH = #{evidencePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVIDENCE_PATH_NAME = #{evidencePathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPINION = #{opinion,jdbcType=CLOB},
COUNTY_VIEWS = #{countyViews,jdbcType=CLOB},
CITY_OPINION = #{cityOpinion,jdbcType=CLOB},
DIC_MONITOR_GRADE_KEY = #{dicMonitorGradeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_NUM = #{writNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HAND_ON_UNIT = #{handOnUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COPY_UNIT = #{copyUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOW_RESULT = #{showResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOW_DETAIL = #{showDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHOW_ACTION = #{showAction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCURATORATE = #{procuratorate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCURATORATE_PATH = #{procuratoratePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCURATORATE_PATH_NAME = #{procuratoratePathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULT = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REDUCE_PATH = #{reducePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REDUCE_PATH_NAME = #{reducePathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UN_REDUCE_REASON = #{unReduceReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UN_REDUCE_PATH = #{unReducePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UN_REDUCE_PATH_NAME = #{unReducePathName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_CHECK_TYPE_KEY = #{dicCheckTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONCRETE_FACTS = #{concreteFacts,jdbcType=CLOB},
COURT = #{court,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PEOPLE_PROCURATORATE = #{peopleProcuratorate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POLICE = #{police,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRISON = #{prison,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSUE_TIME = #{issueTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
dic_SdfsKey=#{dicSdfsKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

if.test: culprit!=null and culprit.name != null and culprit.name!=''

sql.if: AND exists ( select t4.id from (select * from sys_group start with id= #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior id = parent_id) t4 where t3.ID=t4.id)
